item.description:
Hey Sports Fans...Enjoy a great night out at this upscale Sports Bar in Glastonbury! It was voted Runner-Up for best Sports Bar in CT by Hartford Magazine!

Arrive at 6:30pm and kick back and relax on a Sunday night before the work week!
* Enjoy a Great Pub Menu...Order some Appetizers, Salads, Sandwiches, Burgers & Beer, Wine or a Cocktail!

* Mingle & Challenge another team at the Bar to a game of Trivia Pursuit...On the Big Flat Screen TVs!

* Watch the Giants & Cowboys Game starting at 8:20pm-11 Wide Screen TVs to choose from!

Hope to see you there!


DIRECTIONS
FROM ROUTE 91

Take Route 3 Exit 25 (Putnam Bridge) to Route 2 East.

Get off Exit 8 and bear Right onto Hebron Avenue. The

Diamond is two blocks down on your right. Turn Right onto Concord Street just before The Diamond and park in the rear.


FROM ROUTE 2

Route 2 East: Take Exit 8 bear Right onto Hebron Avenue.

The Diamond is two blocks down on your right. Turn Right onto Concord Street just before The Diamond and Park in the rear.


ROUTE 2 WEST

Take Exit 8 bear right off the exit then left onto

Hebron Avenue. The Diamond is just before the third light.

Turn Right onto Concord Street and park in the rear.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Meetup sign on our table

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Diamond Pub & Grill Sports Bar Fun Night!
